TextBlock.Text: CASSAVA: The deadly matter in this site appears to consistently rise as the <color=lightblue>Attlerock</color> orbits overhead.
CASSAVA: Hypothesis: the matter obeys, and can be competitively manipulated by sources of gravity.
CASSAVA: Hypothesis confirmed. The possibilities this creates...
CASSAVA: I must return to <color=lightblue>Giant's Deep</color> at once.
